meanings.definition: The act of observing the stars.
meanings.sent1: During our stargazings, we saw many constellations in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: She loves stargazings and often goes out at night to look at the stars.
meanings.sent3: The stargazings last night were so peaceful and calming.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for stargazings is like a never-ending journey through the universe.
meanings.sent5: The stargazings on the hill made her feel like she was part of something bigger.

meanings.definition: A person who enjoys looking at the stars.
meanings.sent1: As a stargazings, he could spend hours with his telescope exploring the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The stargazings brought their own telescope to the astronomy club meeting.
meanings.sent3: The little stargazings was thrilled to spot a shooting star for the first time.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated stargazings, always eager to share her knowledge with others.
meanings.sent5: The young stargazings dreamed of becoming an astronaut one day to explore beyond the stars.

meanings.definition: The practice of studying the stars.
meanings.sent1: In astronomy class, they learned about the history of stargazings.
meanings.sent2: His interest in stargazings led him to pursue a degree in astrophysics.
meanings.sent3: The stargazings workshop was full of curious minds eager to learn.
meanings.sent4: The art of stargazings requires patience and a keen eye for detail.
meanings.sent5: Through stargazings, scientists have made incredible discoveries about the universe.
